text.section: Commission staff shall make the initial findings under subsection (b) of this section based on a preponderance of the evidence.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, the Commission shall make the initial findings and issue recommendations for appropriate action within 120 calendar days of the receipt of the complaint.

The Commission may extend the time limit set forth in paragraph (1) of this subsection:
for good cause; or
if the parties agree to mediate a settlement to the complaint.

text.section: The Commission shall notify the complainant and the business entity within 5 business days of the issuance of the initial findings and recommendations, including an explanation of the reasons justifying the initial findings.
